metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20337 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: There is a stack-based buffer overflow in the parse_makernote function of dcraw_common.cpp in LibRaw 0.19.1. Crafted input will lead to a denial of service or possibly unspecified other impact.

criterions.comment: darktable package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
dcraw package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
exactimage package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
kodi package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
libraw package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.19.2-2').
rawtherapee package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
